They charge you for the game then charge you again for individual characters. Greedy double dipping!

For those thinking to buy this game,do NOT do it. The devs care little to naught about it and never hear the communities' opinions, let alone fix the most fundamental problems of this game. They are only interested in making more money by promoting new chapters so players can buy,instead of balancing a game where the killers are actually the ones being "hunted". This game is in favor of one side, the matchmaking,only worsens the state of the game, along with the boon totems. Make yourself a favor and buy something else with the money you've got instead of this piece of garbage. 0/10
It is so addicting and i love it

The  game is shit but i enjoy it

This piece of shit is the worst thing to have ever happened to humanity. You want to have fun, balanced and meaningful games continue on, this is not the game for you. Pussy ass toxic survivors who are as bad at the game as I am in bed, only surviving because they're using OP perks, like decisive strike if you are horrible at looping, boons to completely nullify any Hex (discounting Haunted grounds), borrowed time cuz unhooking in front of the killer and him not being able to do anything is so much fun, dead hard as if the survivors already did not have enough advantages and the list goes on. Now take the killer perks: 95 percent of them are absolutely fucking useless, and most of the good ones are locked behind a paywall, unlike the good survivor perks which are all on basic survivors, you have to spend at least another 15 euros to get any good perks on killer and have the slightest of chance to win. And guess what will happen when you play? Toxic survivors that take advantage of the fact you are trying to have fun and are new and then keep blinding you, T-bagging you and then even after playing like they're on a console will trash talk you in post game chat and will most likely make sure new players never play killer again. Why do you think survivor game queues are so long? Because these survivors who play meta perks only and are dicks are making sure killers keep leaving the game. Take the game I just played for example: Me, a level 1 Doctor with 1 level 1 perk, trying to have some fun, practice and learn him, what do I get? After getting cocksucked by the game when trying to hit them with shock therapy, I absolutely annihilate the David who was doing his feeble attempt at looping, I hook him, and guess what? 3 gens at once are popped. 3! Yes you heard right 3 out of 5 gens in the first minute. Do I need to say more? No but I will. And when these gen rushing build survivors actually meet a good player and get annihilated cuz they suck at the game they will just complain at the forums and BHVR being the absolutely useless company it is will cave in and nerf the killers again. Which leads to what? If you want to at least have a fighting chance as a killer you will have to resort to playing meta killers( Blight, Nurse, Spirit) with meta perks (Barbecue and chilly, Pop goes the weasel, Ruin, Tinkerer and other gen regression perks) and still have to play a) Like an absolute beast, one mistake and you are done b) Have to tunnel and camp. In the end you can not have fun, of the 26 killers you will have to play only 3, of all the perks you will only use like 10, you will have to become the sweatiest tryhard in existence just to not lose in the first minute as a killer. As a survivor? Good luck finding a game if the killers keep leaving for the reasons listed above, cuz I am certainly not playing killer ever again. At this point they might as well delete the killers and just let the survivors repair gens on an empty field. So in short: is this game worth your money? Yes.

Fantastic game: fun gameplay, endless content, interesting lore, alright community, and regular updates. What's not to like?

Kept me playing for hundreds of hours before finally becoming burnt out. And still keeps me coming back each time a new update drops. Well worth your money.

After putting in over a 100 hours into the game, it's not really fun doing solo survival characters, the constant killers that do crowd control as well as unfair killer mentality that prefer to do tunneling and camping so if you're the unlucky one, you will get less points and have a harder time leveling anything up. I wouldn't recommend this if you are going into this as a solo player, go with friends so you can at least have some fun. I am sure the killer mains will complain that survivors also have op stuff, but as far as I see, that's between the difference of solo vs surviving with friends (SWF), killers have more control over the game than they think for the most part.
